mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) AS RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT A.*, B.user_name, B.user_id FROM tb_login_history A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_USER_INFO B ON A.USER_SEQ = B.USER_SEQ WHERE 1=1
AND TO_CHAR(A.ACCESS_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') = REPLACE(#{KEYWORD}, '-', '')
AND LOWER(B.USER_ID) LIKE '%'||LOWER(#{KEYWORD})||'%'
AND LOWER(B.USER_NAME) LIKE '%'||LOWER(#{KEYWORD})||'%'
AND A.REQ_IP LIKE '%'||#{KEYWORD}||'%'
AND LOWER(A.REQ_DEVICE) LIKE '%'||LOWER(#{KEYWORD})||'%'
ORDER BY access_dt DESC ) A ) A WHERE 1 = 1
AND A.RNUM > (#{PAGE} - 1) * #{PAGESIZE} AND A.RNUM <= #{PAGE} * #{PAGESIZE}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_login_history A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_USER_INFO B ON A.USER_SEQ = B.USER_SEQ WHERE 1=1
AND TO_CHAR(A.ACCESS_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') = REPLACE(#{KEYWORD}, '-', '')
AND LOWER(B.USER_ID) LIKE '%'||LOWER(#{KEYWORD})||'%'
AND LOWER(B.USER_NAME) LIKE '%'||LOWER(#{KEYWORD})||'%'
AND A.REQ_IP LIKE '%'||#{KEYWORD}||'%'
AND LOWER(A.REQ_DEVICE) LIKE '%'||LOWER(#{KEYWORD})||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_login_history ( seq, access_dt, user_seq, log_type, req_ip, req_device ) VALUES ( nextval('sq_tb_login_history'), now(), CAST(#{user_seq} as integer), #{log_type}, #{req_ip}, #{req_device} )
